about_the_game:
Brought back from the Void, The Evil Piñata of Destruction is the embodiment of all the evilness in the world. Also makes a great party toy to whack with a bat!

Gives El Loco another Piñata he can choose to use instead of his trustworthy Juan-Carlos.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Alcohol misuse. Game does not encourage to it though.
-Some violence, including shooting with firearms and some self-harm.

detailed_description:
Brought back from the Void, The Evil Piñata of Destruction is the embodiment of all the evilness in the world. Also makes a great party toy to whack with a bat!

Gives El Loco another Piñata he can choose to use instead of his trustworthy Juan-Carlos.
name: The Real Man Summer Championship 2019 - The Evil Piñata of Destruction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 GTX or Radeon R7 260x series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or Radeon R9 280X series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Brought back from the Void, The Evil Piñata of Destruction is the embodiment of all the evilness in the world. Also makes a great party toy to whack with a bat!
